name: Arc-Hades
description:
The Game

It's a 2D retro arcade endless hack n' slash / shooter where player plays as a demigod fighting demon spawns, as they master up to 3 different weapons, aiming to become the best hi-score player in the room.

The project

Made it for fun after being assigned to re-imagine a modern game as an arcade game for a school project.

This was made in 6 hours and had tons of retro arcade-like restrictions, but overall its okay.

Thanks for playing!
